about_the_game:
Metal Head Warfare is one of the best fast-paced shooting games in 4K and 120 FPS, modern and with wonderful graphics Arcade game new generation the best of the moment , where players collect superpowers and become increasingly powerful to defeat chaos and evil in a world on the brink of the abyss.
